messages.subject: Fujii Kogen's Castle
messages.msgSnippet: I found an old link which was asking how to pronounce the castle  for Fujii Kogen. The castle is called Shoreizan . This is the actual way to pronounce its
messages.messageBody:
I found an old link which was asking how to pronounce
the castle for Fujii Kogen.

The castle is called "Shoreizan". This is the actual
way to pronounce its name.


Also, if interested, I have one picture of it.

I don't know if anyone cares about that anymore, but
I figured I'd answer that question anyway.



____________________________________________________________________________________

messages.subject: SamuraiWiki Benchmark
messages.msgSnippet: The Samuraiwiki has just reached 1,500 articles on various aspects of Japanese history: http://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=Main_Page Here are
messages.messageBody:
The Samuraiwiki has just reached 1,500 articles on various aspects of
Japanese history:

http://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=Main_Page

Here are some of the current top categories:

Samurai ‎(712 articles)

Take a look. And anyone interested in writing articles should join
the wiki users group.
